module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *14.0.1.19* Fix fwconsole m to detect tty or not *14.0.1.18* Remove default on freepbx_log table *14.0.1.16* FREEPBX-15800 FREEPBX-15944 *14.0.1.15* Support Asterisk 15 *14.0.1.14* fix issue with undefined newvers *14.0.1.13* Fixes to system upgrades page *14.0.1.12* FREEPBX-14185 wrong permissions on single files *14.0.1.11* FREEPBX-15944 Errors during CLI installation *14.0.1.10* Adjust Asterisk Manager Caching *14.0.1.9* FREEPBX-15692 *14.0.1.8* Fixed bug in installer *14.0.1.7* FREEPBX-15592 *14.0.1.6* FREEPBX-15369 *14.0.1.5* Enable caching *14.0.1.4* Remove res_digium_phones from noload even if pjsip is disabled *14.0.1.3* Remove res_digium_phones from noload *14.0.1.2* FREEPBX-15283 FREEPBX-15364 *14.0.1.1* FREEPBX-15203 Fix the active count on module admin summary. *14.0.1* Stable release *14.0.1rc1.30* FREEPBX-15177 *14.0.1rc1.29* Runuser 'changes to the target users home directory' *14.0.1rc1.28* FREEPBX-14745 Expose All Feature Codes in Advanced settings - codes are enabled by default *14.0.1rc1.27* A trival fix for misconfigured RasPI type systems without PATH env set *14.0.1rc1.26* FREEPBX-14703 - Handle yum update errors correctly *14.0.1rc1.25* Minor installer fixes *14.0.1rc1.24* Bump *14.0.1rc1.23* FREEPBX-15088 fix login when using user manager *14.0.1rc1.21* FREEPBX-14939 Add longpoll check ajax start *14.0.1rc1.20* Developer Moder improvements *14.0.1rc1.20* FREEPBX-15046 recursive chown blacklist *14.0.1rc1.19* FREEPBX-14941 Mail wrapper setting header incorrectly *14.0.1rc1.18* Change size of kvstore indexes and fix retrieve conf errors *14.0.1rc1.17* FREEPBX-14934 fix broken login in rare cases *14.0.1rc1.16* FREEPBX-14918 make sure asteriskcdrdb is set in install, if not then default *14.0.1rc1.15* FREEPBX-14867 chown blacklist breaks chown *14.0.1rc1.14* chown correction #1 *14.0.1rc1.13* Merge 13 into 14 *14.0.1rc1.12* Add view for destinations entry *14.0.1rc1.10* Merge 13 into 14 *14.0.1rc1.9* Merge 13 release into 14 *14.0.1rc1.8* FREEPBX-14460 language selection not working *14.0.1rc1.7* Add json stack traces *14.0.1rc1.6* FREEPBX-14406: Tables created with different char sets *14.0.1rc1.5* FREEPBX-14381 *14.0.1rc1.4* FREEPBX-14398 *14.0.1rc1.3* Merge 13 release into 14 *14.0.1rc1.2* Fix doctrine casing *14.0.1rc1.1* Reference moment after ready *14.0.1rc1* RC1 *14.0.1beta20* Merge 13 release into 14 *14.0.1beta19* add locking library *14.0.1beta18* Update for 1702 release *14.0.1beta16* Ensure update hooks are deleted *14.0.1beta15* Fix issue with compressed js library *14.0.1beta14* FREEPBX-14023 - Fix issues with yum updates *14.0.1beta13* Merge 13 changes in *14.0.1beta12* Quiet the chown during upgrades *14.0.1beta11* Bad javascript new line *14.0.1beta4* Testing of system updater in Module Admin *14.0.1beta1* Betaing *14.0.1alpha1* Inital Release
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
